Whether it's our signature sauce, toppings, or fresh, original dough, we invest in our ingredients to ensure you have the best Mt. Pleasant pizza for any occasion. Call us for pizza delivery in Mt. Pleasant or stop by 1145 Johnnie Dodds Blvd for carryout to order the best pizza in Mt. Pleasant, along with breadsticks, wings, and more!
